verses.verse: I will sing<WH7891> of the mercies<WH2617> of the Lord<WH3068> for ever<WH5769>: with my mouth<WH6310> will I make known<WH3045> your faithfulness<WH530> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
For I have said<WH559>, Mercy<WH2617> shall be built up<WH1129> for ever<WH5769>: your faithfulness<WH530> shall you establish<WH3559> in the very heavens<WH8064>.
I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with my chosen<WH972>, I have sworn<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>,
Your seed<WH2233> will I establish<WH3559> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, and build up<WH1129> your throne<WH3678> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. Selah<WH5542>.
And the heavens<WH8064> shall praise<WH3034> your wonders<WH6382>, O Lord<WH3068>: your faithfulness<WH530> also in the congregation<WH6951> of the saints<WH6918>.
For who in the heaven<WH7834> can be compared<WH6186> unto the Lord<WH3068>? who among the sons<WH1121> of the mighty<WH410> can be likened<WH1819> unto the Lord<WH3068>?
God<WH410> is greatly<WH7227> to be feared<WH6206> in the assembly<WH5475> of the saints<WH6918>, and to be had in reverence<WH3372> of all them that are about him<WH5439>.
O Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, who is a strong<WH2626> Lord<WH3050> like unto you<WH530>? or to your faithfulness round about you<WH5439>?
You rule<WH4910> the raging<WH1348> of the sea<WH3220>: when the waves<WH1530> there arise<WH7721>, you still them<WH7623>.
You have broken<WH1792> Rahab<WH7294> in pieces<WH1792>, as one that is slain<WH2491>; you have scattered<WH6340> your enemies<WH341> with your strong<WH5797> arm<WH2220>.
The heavens<WH8064> are your<WH776>, the earth also is your<WH8398>: as for the world and the fullness<WH4393> there<WH3245>, you have founded them.
The north<WH6828> and the south<WH3225> you have created<WH1254> them<WH8396>: Tabor and Hermon<WH2768> shall rejoice<WH7442> in your name<WH8034>.
You have a mighty<WH1369> arm<WH2220>: strong<WH5810> is your hand<WH3027>, and high<WH7311> is your right hand<WH3225>.
Justice<WH6664> and judgment<WH4941> are the habitation<WH4349> of your throne<WH3678>: mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> shall go<WH6923> before your face<WH6440>.
Blessed<WH835> is the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> the joyful sound<WH8643>: they shall walk<WH1980>, O Lord<WH3068>, in the light<WH216> of your favor<WH6440>.
In your name<WH8034> shall they rejoice<WH1523> all the day<WH3117>: and in your righteousness<WH6666> shall they be exalted<WH7311>.
For you are the glory<WH8597> of their strength<WH5797>: and in your favor<WH7522> our horn<WH7161> shall be exalted<WH7311>.
For the Lord<WH3068> is our defense<WH4043>; and the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> is our king<WH4428>.

Then you spoke<WH1696> in vision<WH2377> to your holy one<WH2623>, and said<WH559>, I have laid<WH7737> help<WH5828> upon one that is mighty<WH1368>; I have exalted<WH7311> one chosen<WH977> out of the people<WH5971>.
I have found<WH4672> David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>; with my holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081> have I anointed him<WH4886>:
With whom my hand<WH3027> shall be established<WH3559>: my arm<WH2220> also shall strengthen him<WH553>.
The enemy<WH341> shall not exact<WH5378> upon him<WH1121>; nor the son of wickedness<WH5766> afflict him<WH6031>.
And I will beat down<WH3807> his foes<WH6862> before his face<WH6440>, and plague<WH5062> them that hate him<WH8130>.
But my faithfulness<WH530> and my mercy<WH2617> shall be with him<WH8034>: and in my name shall his horn<WH7161> be exalted<WH7311>.
I will set<WH7760> his hand<WH3027> also in the sea<WH3220>, and his right hand<WH3225> in the rivers<WH5104>.
He shall cry<WH7121> unto me<WH1>, You are my father, my God<WH410>, and the rock<WH6697> of my salvation<WH3444>.
Also I will make<WH5414> him my firstborn<WH1060>, higher<WH5945> than the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776>.
My mercy<WH2617> will I keep<WH8104> for him for evermore<WH5769>, and my covenant<WH1285> shall stand fast with him<WH539>.
His seed<WH2233> also will I make<WH7760> to endure for ever<WH5703>, and his throne<WH3678> as the days<WH3117> of heaven<WH8064>.
If his sons<WH1121> forsake<WH5800> my law<WH8451>, and walk<WH3212> not in my judgments<WH4941>;
If they break<WH2490> my statutes<WH2708>, and keep<WH8104> not my commandments<WH4687>;
Then will I visit<WH6485> their transgression<WH6588> with the rod<WH7626>, and their iniquity<WH5771> with stripes<WH5061>.
Nevertheless my lovingkindness<WH2617> will I not utterly take<WH6331> from him<WH530>, nor allow my faithfulness to fail<WH8266>.
My covenant<WH1285> will I not break<WH2490>, nor alter<WH8138> the thing that is gone out<WH4161> of my lips<WH8193>.
Once<WH259> have I sworn<WH7650> by my holiness<WH6944> that I will not lie<WH3576> unto David<WH1732>.
His seed<WH2233> shall endure for ever<WH5769>, and his throne<WH3678> as the sun before me<WH8121>.
It shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5769> as the moon<WH3394>, and as a faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> in heaven<WH7834>. Selah<WH5542>.
But you have cast off<WH2186> and abhorred<WH3988>, you have been angry<WH5674> with your anointed<WH4899>.
You have made void<WH5010> the covenant<WH1285> of your servant<WH5650>: you have profaned<WH2490> his crown<WH5145> by casting it to the ground<WH776>.
You have broken down<WH6555> all his hedges<WH1448>; you have brought<WH7760> his strong holds<WH4013> to ruin<WH4288>.
All that pass by<WH5674> the way<WH1870> plunder<WH8155> him<WH2781>: he is a reproach to his neighbors<WH7934>.
You have set up<WH7311> the right hand<WH3225> of his adversaries<WH6862>; you have made all his enemies<WH341> to rejoice<WH8055>.
You have also turned<WH7725> the edge<WH6697> of his sword<WH2719>, and have not made him to stand<WH6965> in the battle<WH4421>.
You have made his glory<WH2892> to cease<WH7673>, and cast<WH4048> his throne<WH3678> down<WH4048> to the ground<WH776>.
The days<WH3117> of his youth<WH5934> have you shortened<WH7114>: you have covered<WH5844> him with shame<WH955>. Selah<WH5542>.
How long<WH3068>, Lord? will you hide<WH5641> yourself for ever<WH5331>? shall your wrath<WH2534> burn<WH1197> like fire<WH784>?
Remember<WH2142> how short<WH2465> my time is<WH1254>: therefore have you made all men<WH1121> in vain<WH7723>?
What man<WH1397> is he that lives<WH2421>, and shall not see<WH7200> death<WH4194>? shall he deliver<WH4422> his soul<WH5315> from the hand<WH3027> of the grave<WH7585>? Selah<WH5542>.
Lord<WH136>, where are your former<WH7223> lovingkindnesses<WH2617>, which you swore<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> in your truth<WH530>?
Remember<WH2142>, Lord<WH136>, the reproach<WH2781> of your servants<WH5650>; how I do carry<WH5375> in my bosom<WH2436> the reproach of all the mighty<WH7227> people<WH5971>;
With which your enemies<WH341> have reproached<WH2778>, O Lord<WH3068>; with which they have reproached<WH2778> the footsteps<WH6119> of your anointed<WH4899>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH3068> for evermore<WH5769>. Amen<WH543>, and Amen<WH543>.
